trans-unit.source: OwnerUri cannot be null or empty
trans-unit.target: OwnerUri 不能為 null 或空白

trans-unit.source: SpecifiedUri '{0}' does not have existing connection
Invalid value '{0}' for AuthenticationType. Valid values are 'Integrated' and 'SqlLogin'.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationType 值 "{0}" 無效。 有效值為 'Integrated' 和 'SqlLogin'。

trans-unit.source: Invalid value '{0}' for ApplicationIntent. Valid values are 'ReadWrite' and 'ReadOnly'.
trans-unit.target: '{0}' 為無效的ApplicationIntent值。 有效值為 'ReadWrite' 和 'ReadOnly'。

trans-unit.source: OwnerUri cannot be null or empty
trans-unit.target: OwnerUri 不能是 null 或空白

trans-unit.source: Connection details object cannot be null
trans-unit.target: 連線詳細資料物件不能是 null

trans-unit.source: ServerName cannot be null or empty
trans-unit.target: ServerName 不能是 null 或空白

trans-unit.source: {0} cannot be null or empty when using SqlLogin authentication
trans-unit.target: {0} 不可為空值或空白，使用 SqlLogin 驗證時

trans-unit.source: The query has already completed, it cannot be cancelled
Query successfully cancelled, failed to dispose query. Owner URI not found.
trans-unit.target: 成功地取消查詢，無法處置查詢。找不到擁有者 URI 。

trans-unit.source: The batch has not completed, yet
Batch index cannot be less than 0 or greater than the number of batches
trans-unit.target: 批次索引不能小於 0 或大於批次的總數

trans-unit.source: Result set index cannot be less than 0 or greater than the number of result sets
trans-unit.target: 結果集的索引不能小於 0 或大於結果集的總數

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of bytes to return must be greater than zero
trans-unit.target: 傳回的最大位元組數目必須大於零

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of chars to return must be greater than zero
trans-unit.target: 傳回的最大字元數目必須大於零

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of XML bytes to return must be greater than zero
trans-unit.target: 傳回的最大 XML 位元組數目必須大於零
存取方法不可以設為唯寫

trans-unit.source: FileStreamWrapper must be initialized before performing operations
trans-unit.target: 執行前，必須先初始化 FileStreamWrapper

trans-unit.source: This FileStreamWrapper cannot be used for writing
trans-unit.target: 這個 FileStreamWrapper 不能用於寫入

trans-unit.note: . Parameters: 0 - msg (int), 1 - lvl (int), 2 - state (int), 3 - line (int), 4 - newLine (string), 5 - message (string)

trans-unit.source: The requested query does not exist
This editor is not connected to a database
trans-unit.target: 這個編輯器尚未連接到資料庫

trans-unit.source: A query is already in progress for this editor session. Please cancel this query or wait for its completion.
trans-unit.target: 一個查詢已在這個編輯器工作階段。請取消這項查詢，或等待其完成。

trans-unit.source: Sender for OnInfoMessage event must be a SqlConnection
trans-unit.target: OnInfoMessage 事件的寄件者必須是一個 SqlConnection。

trans-unit.source: Result cannot be saved until query execution has completed
trans-unit.target: 完成查詢執行前無法儲存結果

trans-unit.source: Internal error occurred while starting save task
trans-unit.target: 在儲存工作啟動時，發生內部錯誤

trans-unit.source: A save request to the same path is in progress
trans-unit.target: 相同路徑的儲存要求正在進行中

trans-unit.source: Cannot read subset unless the results have been read from the server
trans-unit.target: 無法讀取子集，除非已經從伺服器讀取結果

trans-unit.source: Start row cannot be less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the result set
trans-unit.target: 開始資料列不能小於 0 或大於結果集中的資料列總數

trans-unit.source: Row count must be a positive integer
trans-unit.target: 資料列計數必須是正整數

trans-unit.source: Could not retrieve column schema for result set
trans-unit.target: 無法從結果集擷取資料行結構描述

trans-unit.source: Could not retrieve an execution plan from the result set
trans-unit.target: 無法從結果集擷取執行計劃

trans-unit.source: This feature is currently not supported on Azure SQL DB and Data Warehouse: {0}
trans-unit.target: 這項功能目前不支援 Azure SQL 資料庫和資料倉儲︰ {0}

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error occurred during Peek Definition execution: {0}
trans-unit.target: 查看定義執行過程中發生未預期的錯誤︰ {0}
沒有資料庫物件被擷取。

trans-unit.source: This object type is currently not supported by this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此功能目前不支援這種物件類型。

trans-unit.source: Position is outside of file line range
Position is outside of column range for line {0}
trans-unit.target: 第 {0} 行位置超出資料行範圍

trans-unit.source: Start position ({0}, {1}) must come before or be equal to the end position ({2}, {3})
trans-unit.target: 開始位置 （{0}，{1}） 必須先於或等於結束位置 （{2}，{3}）

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while the batch was being processed. The error message is: {0}
trans-unit.target: 處理批次時，發生錯誤。錯誤訊息是︰ {0}

trans-unit.source: The previous execution is not yet complete.
Incorrect syntax was encountered while {0} was being parsed.
trans-unit.target: 正在剖析 {0} 時遇到不正確的語法。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while the batch was being executed.
trans-unit.target: 執行此批次時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while the batch was being executed, but the error has been ignored.
trans-unit.target: 執行批次，但被忽略的錯誤時，就會發生錯誤。
正在啟動 {0} 次執行迴圈...

trans-unit.source: The variable {0} could not be found.
Batch parser wrapper execution: {0} found... at line {1}: {2} Description: {3}
trans-unit.target: 批次剖析器包裝函式執行︰位於第 {1} 行: {2} 描述︰{3} 找到 {0}

trans-unit.source: Batch parser wrapper execution engine batch message received: Message: {0} Detailed message: {1}
trans-unit.target: 批次剖析器包裝函式執行引擎批次所收到的訊息︰ 訊息︰ {0}，詳細的訊息︰ {1}

trans-unit.source: Batch parser wrapper execution engine batch ResultSet processing: DataReader.FieldCount: {0} DataReader.RecordsAffected: {1}
trans-unit.target: 批次剖析器包裝函式執行引擎批次結果集處理︰ DataReader.FieldCount: {0} DataReader.RecordsAffected: {1}

trans-unit.source: Batch parser wrapper execution engine batch ResultSet finished.
trans-unit.target: 批次剖析器包裝函式執行引擎批次結果集已完成。

trans-unit.source: Canceling batch parser wrapper batch execution.
trans-unit.target: 正在取消批次剖析器包裝函式的批次執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this error, see the troubleshooting topics in the product documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有關此錯誤的詳細資訊，請參閱產品文件中的疑難排解主題。
檔案 '{0}' 被遞迴方式包含。

trans-unit.source: Unclosed quotation mark after the character string.
trans-unit.target: 未封閉的雙引號記號之後的字元字串。

trans-unit.source: Incorrect syntax was encountered while parsing '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 正在剖析 {0} 時遇到不正確的語法。

trans-unit.source: Replacement of an empty string by an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 用空白字串取代空白字串。

trans-unit.source: Query did not generate exactly one result set
trans-unit.target: 查詢並非產生單一結果集

trans-unit.source: Failed to add new row to update cache
trans-unit.target: 在 cashe 裡更新資料列失敗

trans-unit.source: Given row ID is outside the range of rows in the edit cache
trans-unit.target: 提供的資料列識別碼已超出 edit cashe 中資料列的範圍

trans-unit.source: An update is already pending for this row and must be reverted first
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列已經有一個更新正在等待使用，因此它必須先恢復原狀。

trans-unit.source: Given row ID does not have pending update
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列識別碼並沒有正在等待更新

trans-unit.source: Table or view metadata could not be found
trans-unit.target: 找不到資料表或檢視表中繼資料
二進位資料欄格示錯誤

trans-unit.source: Allowed values for boolean columns are 0, 1, "true", or "false"
trans-unit.target: Boolean 欄位必須填入數字 1 或 0, 或字串 true 或 false

trans-unit.source: A required cell value is missing
A delete is pending for this row, a cell update cannot be applied.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列即將被刪除，其中的儲存格無法被更新

trans-unit.source: Column ID must be in the range of columns for the query
trans-unit.target: 資料行識別碼必須在資料行總數內才可被查詢

trans-unit.source: An output filename must be provided
Database object {0} cannot be used for editing.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫物件 {0} 無法被編輯

trans-unit.source: Specified URI '{0}' does not have a default connection
trans-unit.target: 指定的 URI '{0}' 沒有預設的連線

trans-unit.source: A commit task is in progress. Please wait for completion.
trans-unit.target: 認可的工作正在進行，請等待它完成

trans-unit.source: Decimal column is missing numeric precision or numeric scale
trans-unit.target: 十進位資料行缺少數值有效位數或小數位數

trans-unit.source: Cannot add row to result buffer, data reader does not contain rows
trans-unit.target: 無法在結果緩衝區加資料列，資料讀取器不包含資料列

trans-unit.source: TIME column values must be between 00:00:00.0000000 and 23:59:59.9999999
NULL is not allowed for this column
trans-unit.target: 這欄不允許填入 NULL 值

trans-unit.source: Edit session has not been initialized
trans-unit.target: 編輯工作階段尚未初始化

trans-unit.source: Edit session has already been initialized
Edit session has already been initialized or is in the process of initializing
trans-unit.target: 編輯工作階段已完成初始化或正在初始化

trans-unit.source: Query execution failed, see messages for details
trans-unit.target: 查詢執行失敗, 請查看詳細資訊

trans-unit.source: A object name must be provided
Explicitly specifying server or database is not supported
Table metadata does not have extended properties
Table or view requested for edit could not be found

trans-unit.target: 使用者定義資料表類型
XML 具類型的升級路徑
